products.title: Vesper Calico Roller Blind
products.description: A sheer fabric with a vertical stripe design which provides privacy during the day whilst still allowing natural light through. Their vesper calico roller blind is a patterned cream blind. We offer free delivery on all orders over 145. Nationwide coverage.
